narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Scott & White Memorial Hospital is a Clinic/Center, Ambulatory Surgical provider based in Temple, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $55.1M in Medicaid payments across 1.1M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $55.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
